column1: tawshīt al-nūbah 1. tawshīḥun liḥamdūnin bn al-ḥājj
al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. gharībah muḥarrirah. zajal lābin al-khaṭīb

column2: lā talūmūnī fī hādh al-khalā‘ah yā ha’ulā’ al-nās
mā rīt fī al-dunyā aḥlá wa’aṭyab min al-kās
qum wāintabih wāunẓur ilá dhāk al-‘idhār
waman ma‘ah bahj al-sanā ghunj al-shifār
nāmat jufūnak yā s’lī walam anam
column3: mā dhāk lā lifuriṭ al-wajd wal-lam

column2: ashakwun ilá al-lh mā bī man muḥibbatikum
column3: fahuw al-‘alīm bimā nulqá man al-suqm

column2: inn kān safk damī aqṣá mrādakum
column3: famā ghullat naẓirah minkum bisafk dam
